title: Ticket #7720: Complete condor_dagman direct submission and set to default
description:
In #6974 we added the ability for condor_dagman to send jobs directly to the schedd using submit_utils, instead of forking condor_submit. Currently it works well but does not support the full range of options that condor_submit does, and is not enabled by default.

We want to add in the missing options and make this the default method for job submission in condor_dagman. These options are all described in #6974 and I'll probably elaborate on them later in this ticket.
